Nightstrike:

"I guess that we... can do some mess in their industries"and =
looking to Spattercannon and Injustice he smirked"Just to tell them that we=
're in neiborghood"


Nightstrike took off and flew towards Earth
  ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: S=
aturday, July 09, 2005 1:33 PM
  Subject: Re: The Awakened


  Vorpal: Hunt=
ing someone down? No, there would be too much work even
  for us Minions. N=
o, we have been outnumbered in our sleep, something
  Master Unicron had no=
t planned. We cannot hunt people down. We have to
  start a war, but we mus=
t do this in a methodical way.

  He ordered the reactivation of the sectio=
n after Darkfate was out of
  it, then summoned a holoprojection of Earth.
=

  Vorpal: I need you all to scout. We need to establish how well
  defende=
d their production facilities are in order to plan our attacks.
  There are=
 two places where you must NEVER go though...

  He brought up images of th=
e Cryonosis Tower and of Mount Olympus.

  Vorpal: These are two of the Cyb=
ertronians' most heavily defended
  positions. Cryonosis is a monitoring st=
ation that seems to be watching
  us. Eventually, we will have to take it o=
ut, but not yet. Olympus
  Complex, on the other hand, is the dedicated cen=
tral military
  facility. It is a place so well defended we must not hope t=
o leave
  there unscathed. For now, though, we will concentrate on their or=
bital
  facilities. Go, and report all that you see! 

  --- In nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
  > Nightstrike/Darkfate:
  > =

  > "I don't have any problem... and after this, I guess that Darkfate
  n=
either"replied Nightstrike"What important thing will do?? hunt down
  thore=
 treacherous laidies??? they are a danger that should be
  eradicated as so=
on as possible, I guess that MAster Unicron told ya bout"
  >   ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  >   From: Nic 
  >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  >  =
 Sent: Saturday, July 09, 2005 12:30 PM
  >   Subject: Re: The Awakened
  >=
 
  > 
  >   Vorpal: You are right. Do you hear that, Darkfate? You owe 
  =
>   Nightstrike your life now! Drones, deactivate this section.
  > 
  >   =
The electrical tension suddenly stopped, allowing Darkfate to get 
  >   ou=
t of the trench.
  > 
  >   Vorpal: Can we finally stop bickering about my =
leadership and get 
  >   down to important things, now?
